backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user wellness profiles, kits, and challenges with functions to store preferences, list content, and track challenge progress.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and content of major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes and root layout for all app pages including Free PDFs.
Authentication button handling Internet Identity login, logout, and loading states with dropdown UI.
frontend/src/components/common/BrandLogo: Simple component rendering the Herwellness logo image.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Generic empty state card with optional icon and action button.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Destructive alert component showing error details with optional retry action.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Centered loading indicator with spinner and message.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with brand description, navigation links, Instagram link from config, legal note, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation links, Instagram link, auth button, and mobile menu via Sheet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and routed main content via Outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks to fetch wellness kits, challenges, challenge details, user preferences, and progress using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining color variables, dark mode styles, global base styles, and gradient utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/challenges/storage.ts: LocalStorage utilities for storing and retrieving challenge join state and completed tasks for anonymous users.
frontend/src/lib/challenges/useChallenge: Hook managing challenge join and task completion state for both signed-in and anonymous users using backend or local storage.
frontend/src/lib/content/challenges.ts: Defines the WellnessChallenge interface and provides static challenge data including descriptions, images, and daily tasks.
frontend/src/lib/content/freePdfs.ts: Defines FreePdf interface and static list of downloadable wellness PDFs.
frontend/src/lib/content/index.ts: Re-exports wellness kits, challenges, free PDFs, and site configuration modules.
frontend/src/lib/content/kits.ts: Defines the WellnessKit interface and exports a list of wellness kit metadata including descriptions, images, downloads, and features.
frontend/src/lib/content/siteConfig.ts: Defines site configuration structure and exports Instagram handle and URL settings.
frontend/src/lib/personalization/recomme: Generates personalized wellness recommendations based on user preferences, returning a summary and up to six suggestions.
frontend/src/lib/personalization/storage: Provides functions to store, retrieve, and clear wellness preferences from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/personalization/usePref: React hook that saves preferences locally and, when signed in, syncs them to the backend while tracking loading and error states.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutFaqPage.tsx: Renders the About and FAQ page with mission details and common questions about the Herwellness platform.
frontend/src/pages/ChallengeDetailPage.t: Displays detailed information for a wellness challenge, including tasks, progress tracking, and join/leave actions.
frontend/src/pages/ChallengesListPage.ts: Shows a grid of all wellness challenges with summaries and navigation to individual challenge pages.
frontend/src/pages/FreePdfsPage.tsx: Lists free downloadable PDF resources and handles client-side download initiation with basic loading feedback.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero, feature cards, and navigation to personalized wellness and wellness kits.
frontend/src/pages/PersonalizationQuesti: Interactive questionnaire collecting user wellness preferences with validation and saving via preferences sync.
frontend/src/pages/PersonalizationResult: Displays personalized wellness recommendations based on stored preferences and offers related resources.
frontend/src/pages/PersonalizedWellnessE: Intro page explaining benefits of personalized wellness and linking to the questionnaire.
frontend/src/pages/WellnessKitDetailPage: Shows detailed info for a specific wellness kit with download functionality and fallback for missing kits.
Lists all available wellness kits with images and links to detailed kit pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata including version info, architectural notes, and a list of existing Herwellness features and requirements.
